attributes.title: DONT DOWNLOAD!!!
attributes.review: I downloaded the app thinking it was helpful but it gave my phone a virus AND a glitch it affected my phone battery and I had to reset my phone the WORST APP EVER

attributes.title: Gross terrible never ever
attributes.review: This is the worst app ever it’s pointless and stupid it’s trashhhhh and I hate it don’t get it it’s just a huge waste of your TIME !! Don’t do it!.

attributes.title: no❤️
attributes.review: when i first got the app it asked me if i wanted to be grabbed by the pu*** and when i said “no” the app turned red and i could not exit the app, it had completely took over my phone and took all my information, so now the predators president probably knows where i am.

attributes.title: App crash
attributes.review: Every time I open this app it crashes, rendering me unable to support our dear, loving president Donald J. Trump. It breaks my heart to say that I have to delete it, but I must. 😩😫😭💔

attributes.title: I’d give it 0 stars if I could
attributes.review: This app is supporting some racist, misogynistic, homophobic Cheeto. I’m astounded Apple allowed such an app to be available on the App Store. Would NOT recommend!!

attributes.title: Disgusting
attributes.review: This app is absolute trash and I don’t understand how anyone could support our Cheeto of a president. He’s a racist, sexist, disgusting human and it shows through this app, DO NOT RECOMMEND!!! 🤮🤬

attributes.title: Tiktok
attributes.review: I think this app doesn’t need to be an app at all I mean look at all the bad things we are going into bc of trump🤷🏽‍♀️ #worthless

attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review: It kept giving me false and stupid information

attributes.title: Dumb
attributes.review: This app has zero actual purpose and no type of reasoning for it. No information on this is trust worthy.

attributes.title: I HATE IT!!!!
